outline:
1. stroke, plague, disease, mark, plague spot
    1. stroke, wound
    2. stroke (metaphorical of disease)
    3. mark (of leprosy)
kjv_def: plague, sore, stricken, stripe, stroke, wound.
strongs_def: a blow (figuratively, infliction); also (by implication) a spot (concretely, a leprous person or dress)
